Reviews.Title: Love the style and design!!!
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: I bought a couple customized phones from icolorlcd and I could not be more happy! These pieces are so beautiful. I love my gold iPhone with swarovski crystals and my sister is so happy with her pink mirror phone! Icolorlcd truly makes  the piece of art from regular phones. I will definitely buy from icolorlcd as soon as I am ready to upgrade! A++++++++++++++++++++++

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with CDMA(Verizon) and ANY GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20 and select prepaid carriers).
4.0-inch Retina display
A7 chip with M7 motion coprocessor (the most advanced on the market)
Touch ID fingerprint sensor
8MP iSight camera with True Tone flash and 1080p HD video recording
ProductInfo.Name: Apple Iphone 5s (Latest Model) 16gb 24k Gold Plated /Swarovski Crystals / Gold and Black/ Verizon - Factory Unlocked/ International
